entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
